{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.10425v1", "title": "Expected Length of the Longest Common Subsequence of Multiple Strings", "summary": "We study the generalized Chv\'atal-Sankoff constant $\gamma_{k,d}$, which
represents the normalized expected length of the longest common subsequence
(LCS) of $d$ independent uniformly random strings over an alphabet of size $k$.
We derive asymptotically tight bounds for $\gamma_{2,d}$, establishing that
$\gamma_{2,d} = \frac{1}{2} + \Theta\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{d}}\right)$. We also
derive asymptotically near-optimal bounds on $\gamma_{k,d}$ for $d\ge
\Omega(\log k)$.", "main_category": "math.CO", "categories": "math.CO,cs.DM,math.PR", "published": "2025-04-14T17:15:51Z"}
